Switching Leap.name: Switching Leap
Switching Leap.flavor: You throw your body in front of an incoming attack, knocking your ally out of the way.
Switching Leap.trigger: An adjacent ally is hit by a melee attack
Switching Leap.effect: You slide the target 2 squares and can shift into the space the target occupied. You become the target of the triggering attack.

Quicksilver Lunge.name: Quicksilver Lunge
Quicksilver Lunge.flavor: Spotting a weak point, you quickly lunge and strike.
Quicksilver Lunge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Too Close for Comfort.name: Too Close for Comfort
Too Close for Comfort.flavor: You and your biting blade stay on your enemyâ€™s heels.
Too Close for Comfort.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, if the target moves, you can move up to your speed as a free action, ending your movement adjacent to the target.
